Verses: 1 yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Sidhekkiyaa Arasaanda Onbadhaam Varusham Paththaam Maadhaththile Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaarum Avanudaiya Ellaa Raanuvamum Erusalemukku Virodhamaai Vandhu, Adhai Mutrikkaipottaargal.
2 sidhekkiyaa Arasaanda Padhinoraam Varusham Naalaam Maadham, Onbadhaam Thedhiyile Nagaraththu Madhilil Thirappukkandadhu.

3 appozhudhu Baabilon Raajaavin Prabukkalaagiya Nerkalsaredhser, Samkaarnepo, Sarsegim, Rapsaarees, Therkalsaredhser, Rapmaak Enbavargalum, Baabilon Raajaavin Matra Ellaap Prabukkalum Utpravesiththu, Naduvaasalil Irundhaargal.

4 appozhudhu Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya, Sidhekkiyaavum Sagala Yuththa Manusharum Avargalaik Kandapodhu, Odi, Raaththiri Kaalaththil Raajaavudaiya Thottaththuvazhiye, Irandu Madhilgalukku Naduvaana Vaasalaal Nagaraththilirundhu Purappattup Ponaargal; Avan Vayalveliyin Vazhiye Poivittaan.

5 aanaalum Kaldheyarudaiya Raanuvam Avargalaip Pinthodarndhu, Erigovin Samaboomiyil Sidhekkiyaavaik Kitti, Avanaip Pidiththu, Avanai Aamaathdhesaththin Ooraagiya Riplaavukku, Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaaridaththil Konduponaargal; Ange Ivan Avanaik Kuriththuth Theerppu Seydhaan.
6 pinbu Baabilon Raajaa Riplaavile, Sidhekkiyaavin Kumaararai Avan Kangalukku Munbaaga Vettuviththaan; Yoodhaa Prabukkal Anaivaraiyum Baabilon Raajaa Vetti,
7 sidhekkiyaavin Kangalaik Keduththu, Avanai Baabilonukkuk Kondupoga Avanukku Irandu Vengala Vilangugalaip Pottaan.
8 kaldheyar, Raajaavin Aramanaiyaiyum Janaththin Veedugalaiyum Akkiniyaal Sutteriththu, Erusalemin Madhilgalai Idiththuppottaargal.

9 nagaraththil Thangiyirundha Janangalaiyum, Than Patchaththil Odivandhuvittavargalaiyum, Meedhiyaana Matra Janangalaiyum, Kaavar Senaadhipadhiyaagiya Nebusaraadhaan Baabilonukku Siraigalaagak Konduponaan.
10 kaavar Senaadhipadhiyaagiya Nebusaraadhaan Ondrumillaadha Ezhaigalil Silarai Yoodhaa Dhesaththile Vaiththu, Avargalukku Annaalile Dhraatchaththottangalaiyum Vayalnilangalaiyum Koduththaan.
11 aanaalum Eremiyaavaik Kuriththu, Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Kaavarchenaadhipadhiyaagiya Nebusaraadhaanai Nokki:
12 nee Avanai Azhaippiththu, Avanukku Oru Pollaappum Seyyaamal, Avanaip Paththiramaaip Paarththu, Avan Unnode Sollugirapadiyellaam Avanai Nadaththendru Kattalaikoduththaan.
13 appadiye Kaavarchenaadhipadhiyaagiya Nebusaraadhaanum, Nebusaspaan, Rapsaarees, Nerkalsaredhser, Rapmaak Enbavargalum, Baabilon Raajaavin Ellaap Prabukkalum,

14 eremiyaavaik Kaavarchaalaiyin Mutraththilirundhu Varavazhaiththu, Avanai Veliye Veettukku Azhaiththukkondupogumpadikku Avanai Saappaanudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Agikkaamin Maganaana Kedhaliyaavinidaththil Oppuviththaargal; Appadiye Avan Janaththukkulle Thangiyirundhaan.
15 idhuvumallaamal Eremiyaa Innum Kaavarchaalaiyin Mutraththile Adaikkappattirukkaiyil, Avanukkuk Karththaraal Undaana Vasanam:

16 nee Poi, Eththiyoppiyanaagiya Epedhmelekkukku Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal, Idho, Ennudaiya Vaarththaigalai Indha Nagaraththinmel Nanmaiyaaga Alla, Theemaiyaagave Varappannuven; Avaigal Annaalile Un Kangalukku Munbaaga Niraiverum Endru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
17 aanaal Annaalile Unnaith Thappuvippen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Nee Bayappadugira Manusharin Kaiyile Oppukkodukkappaduvadhillai.
18 unnai Nichchayamaaga Viduvippen, Nee Pattayaththukku Iraiyaavadhillai; Nee Ennai Nambinapadiyinaal Un Praanan Unakkuk Kidaiththa Kollaipporulaippola Irukkumendru Karththar Sollugiraar Endraar.
